info.name: Azul style for Rojo
info.description:
Apply a theme that look like the real Azul boardgame to the online Rojo game. You can customize the font, I recommand Lora. You can download it here or add this code to the begining of the code : 
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Lora:wght@500&display=swap');
info.additionalInfo:
== Version 1 ==
First final version!
Many small adjustments. Tiles looks 3D and shadow are smooth.

== Version 0.1 ==
First release, main assets are on it.
